author: The Wall Street Journal
description:
British Airways has invested some $135 million into improving punctuality in order to reduce flight delays. The airline’s playbook for prepping each flight is called the Precision Time Schedule and involves a fleet of teams, from cargo and baggage to cleaning and catering. Behind BA’s new punctuality records lies a suite of AI tools and high-tech operations centers. WSJ explores the logistics behind the vital aircraft turnaround. 

#Aviation #Flights #Shorts
title: The Hidden Logistics Behind Flight Turnarounds
